FIRMWARE UPDATE

You are going to update firmware on the device.
Please, choose file from your local hard drive and click Update firmware button.

WARNINGSï¼š
  • This U-Boot version supports both OpenWrt 'squashfs-factory' firmware and JD-Cloud firmware
  • do not power off the device during update
  • if everything goes well, the device will restart
  • you can upload whatever you want, so be sure that you choose proper firmware image for your device
Onigiri-Boot: 24.10.07
